mapper.select:
SELECT a.ID, a.DICT_CODE, a.DICT_NAME, a.DICT_TYPE, a.DICT_AUTH, b.TYPE_NAME FROM LAMMY_DICTIONARY a, LAMMY_DICTIONARY_TYPE b WHERE a.DICT_TYPE = b.TYPE_CODE AND a.IS_DELETE = 0
AND a.DICT_TYPE = #{dictType}
mapper.update: UPDATE LAMMY_DICTIONARY SET DICT_NAME = #{dictName},UPDATE_TIME= #{updateTime} WHERE ID=#{id}
